sentences.en: The injection sent his leg into spasm.
sentences.cn: 一针打下去，他的腿就痉挛了。

sentences.en: I had slipped a disc and was frozen in a spasm of pain.
sentences.cn: 我的一块椎间盘脱臼了，突然一阵疼痛使我动弹不得。

sentences.en: A muscular spasm in the coronary artery can cause a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 冠状动脉内肌肉痉挛会导致心脏病发作。
